General.Name: CITIC Heavy Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: CITIC Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. engages in the manufacture and sale of heavy machinery in China and internationally. The company offers grinding mills; crushers; vertical stirred mills; high pressure grinding rolls; mine hoists; vertical roller mills; rotary kilns; and liners. It also provides equipment installation, testing, maintenance, refurbishing, remote monitoring and diagnosis, upgrading and retrofitting, and performance guarantee services. The company was founded in 1956 and is based in Luoyang, China. CITIC Heavy Industries Co., Ltd. operates as a subsidiary of CITIC Corporation Limited
